messages.subject: Shigan Takeda's Wife
messages.msgSnippet: Could someone please tell me the name of Shigan Takeda s wife. And give me a little information on her if you could. Thanks! Gillian Rubinstein
messages.messageBody:
Could someone please tell me the name of Shigan Takeda's wife. And give me a little information on her if you could. Thanks!

imagine him turning in his grave...)
